text: Khaṇḍitavāgiyū allāhana dr̥ṣṭiyalli islām (śaraṇāgati) naija dharmavāgide. Ī hinde grantha nīḍalādavaru, tam'ma baḷige jñānavu banda baḷika kēvala paraspara dvēṣada kāraṇa bhinnamata tāḷiddaru. Allāhana vacanagaḷannu dhikkarisuvavaru (tiḷidirali), allāhanu bahaḷa vēgavāgi vicāraṇe mugisuvavanāgiddāne
